product_name: Helly Hansen Odin Rapide Softshell Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Helly Hansen Odin Rapide is a classic technical soft-shell jacket with unbeaten breathability, so you can hike hard and stay comfortable. Doubleweave soft-shell construction offers stretch and weather resistance and is highly breathable. Durable water repellent finish beads up light rain so it rolls off. Zippered hand pockets and chest pocket. Brushed-tricot lining on the collar feels soft next to skin. Helly Hansen Odin Rapide Softshell Jacket for women has adjustable cuffs and hem to seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Helly Hansen Odin Rapide is a classic technical soft-shell jacket with unbeaten breathability, so you can hike hard and stay comfortable.
